name: incurve - sector 2
description:
Few different ball games with same mechanics to incurve - sector 1,
so it's completely OK if you haven't played the first one.

Goal is to get to the next room with two different modes:
One where you can take all the time you need to get into the next room,
and a second one where you have 15 seconds and breaking a window
will add extra (easy and hard).

Circles have a gravitational pull, when touching the screen.

Use the gravity to gain momentum and release at the right angle to get where you want


• Addictive One touch gameplay
• GameCenter enabled
• Modes and hidden modes.
• Quick-Fix with minimal hassle
• Not so hidden switch
